body_html: Turns out the 'tanh' function and the sigmoid function are related by tanh(a) = 2sigmoid(2a) - 1. tf.sigmoid is supported by Tensorflow Lite, so if there is no LSTM implementation we could replace tf.tanh with tf.sigmoid as needed and have one created.
body_text: Turns out the 'tanh' function and the sigmoid function are related by tanh(a) = 2sigmoid(2a) - 1. tf.sigmoid is supported by Tensorflow Lite, so if there is no LSTM implementation we could replace tf.tanh with tf.sigmoid as needed and have one created.
body: Turns out the 'tanh' function and the sigmoid function are related by tanh(a) = 2*sigmoid(2*a) - 1. tf.sigmoid is supported by Tensorflow Lite, so if there is no LSTM implementation we could replace tf.tanh with tf.sigmoid as needed and have one created.
